Description: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Gives the slotted power a chance to inflict minor fire damage, and reduces the power's recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.  This enhancement's chance to trigger is equal to approximately 4 times per minute.  This enhancement can only be slotted by Blasters and may be slotted into any Blaster damage power.
